Alert

Class AlertManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Alert.AlertManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AlertManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Manages all alerts that have been created

      • createFrequencyAlert

        public Alert createFrequencyAlert(java.time.LocalDateTime dttmEnd,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime dttmActivate,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  long frequency,
                                  java.lang.String eventId)
        Create a new frequency alert and all future alerts will be generated
        Parameters:
        name - The name of event that the alert belongs to
        dttmEnd - The time the frequency ends
        frequency - The frequency that alert repeats
        dttmActivate - The time this alert activate

      • deleteSingleAlert

                              java.lang.String eventID)
                       throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Delete a single alert(either individual or frequent) from the existing alerts by taking the alertID
        Parameters:
        alertID - The unique id of alert that the alert has
        eventID - the unique id of event that the alert belongs to
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException

        public Alert getAlert(java.lang.String alertId)
               throws ObjectNotFoundException

        Parameters:
